## cossin variable

Inline function. Returns vec2(cos(x), sin(x)).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cossin: (x: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Term<"float">) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Lit<"vec2">
```
